metadata.title: CVE-2017-12839 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
A heap-based buffer over-read in the getbits function insrc/libmpg123/getbits.h in mpg123 through 1.25.5 allows remote attackers tocause a possible denial-of-service (out-of-bounds read) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted mp3 file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12839` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmpg123-0 - 1.22.4-1ubuntu0.1+esm2
mpg123 - 1.22.4-1ubuntu0.1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mpg123 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.22.4-1ubuntu0.1+esm2').
